name: Eastern Air Temple
description: One of the two temples exclusively housing female airbenders.

name: Western Water Temple
description: One of the two temples exclusively housing female airbenders.

name: Southern Air Temple
description: One of the two temples exclusively housing male airbenders. Childhood home of Avatar Aang.

name: Northern Air Temple
description: One of the two temples exclusively housing male airbenders.

name: Foggy Swamp
description: Place for immigrants of the Southern Water Tribe with an extensive array of fauna and flora.

name: Spirit Oasis
description: A verdant and lush garden located in a cave in the Northern Water Tribe's capital city at the North Pole.

name: Northern Water Tribe
description: The largest division of its nation and is located on an island situated near the North Pole.

name: Southern Water Tribe
description: Minor division of the Water Tribe. Its people are scattered in tiny villages and settlements located on an island by the South Pole.

name: Si Wong Desert
description: The largest desert in the world.

name: Ba Sing Se
description: The monolithic capital of the Earth Kingdom.

name: Kyoshi Island
description: Famous as the birthplace of Avatar Kyoshi and as the home of the elite Kyoshi Warriors.

name: Omashu
description: The second largest city in the Earth Kingdom and the capital of one of its provinces ruled by King Bumi.

name: Fire Nation Capital
description: The seat of the government for the Fire Nation

name: Boiling Rock
description: A massive Fire Nation prison.

name: Sun Warriors' Ancient City
description: Large, historic settlement located on an island north of the Fire Nation mainland.

name: Fire Fountain City
description: A large industrial city located in the Fire Nation.

name: Spirit Realm
description: a parallel plane of reality that coexists alongside the physical world inhabited by humans.

name: Republic City
description: the capital city of the United Republic of Nations as well as one of the largest and most modern cities in the world, with a population of millions.

name: Wulong Forest
description: a geographical feature situated on the coast of the western United Republic of Nations, formerly the Earth Kingdom, and was the location of the final battle of the Hundred Year War between Fire Lord Ozai and Avatar Aang.

name: Senlin Village
description: The surrounding woodland is protected by a typically peaceful, though occasionally enraged, spirit known as Hei Bai.
